title: Here’s how long it takes new BrutePrint attack to unlock 10 different smartphones
description: BrutePrint requires just $15 of equipment and a little amount of time with a phone.

title: TikTok sues Montana over ban, claims national security concerns “unfounded”
description: Unless legal challenges succeed, Montana's ban will take effect in 2024.

title: The best Mac client for Gmail users is now a 1.0 release with nifty new features
description: Home/Work profiles, notification schedules, and a lack of inbox advertisements.

title: Biden picks new FCC nominee to fill seat that’s been empty for over two years
description: Biden nominates US official Anna Gomez after Senate refused to confirm Gigi Sohn.

title: Life on Earth might have gotten a boost from the Sun’s mega-tantrums
description: High-energy particles efficiently convert atmospheric chemicals to amino acids.

title: Judge refuses gamers’ attempts to immediately halt Microsoft/Activision merger
description: But Judge Corley says plaintiffs now have a "plausible" case for potential harm.

title: HP breaks its own printers (again) with firmware update
description: HP promises it's working on a fix.

title: New EV tire for Teslas, Mustang Mach-E promises better durability
description: Sizes for 13 more EVs will arrive early in 2024.

title: Lawsuit accuses DoorDash of charging iPhone users more for identical orders
description: "Expanded Range Fee" and other numbers change at DoorDash's whim, suit claims.

title: Motorola’s fourth swing at a foldable Razr launches June 1
description: We recap a million Moto Razr leaks, including a cheaper sub-$1,000 model.

title: Hypersensitive robot hand is eerily human in how it can feel things
description: Getting it to work required integrating multiple types of machine learning.

title: Facebook hit with record €1.2 billion GDPR fine for transferring EU data to US
description: Meta to appeal, claims order sets "dangerous precedent" for EU/US data transfers.

title: $270, 2,561-piece Lego Pac-Man arcade cabinet will eat ghosts, disposable income
description: Moving parts, light-up coin slot, and more are inspired by the real thing.

title: China bans Micron’s products from key infrastructure, citing security risk
description: US Commerce Department strongly opposes the action, saying it has "no basis in fact."

title: Ars Frontiers is here: Come (virtually) hang out with the experts
description: Starting at 13:30 EDT, it's an afternoon of mRNA, artificial intelligence, and space.

title: SpaceX launches tenth crewed mission, third fully commercial flight
description: SpaceX has rapidly become the world's most prolific human spaceflight provider.

title: It feels like cheating: The Trek Domane+ SLR9 gravel bike, reviewed
description: At $12,999, the Trek Domane+ SLR9 gravel e-bike is a dream to ride.
